## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G26230](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G26230)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>UOX</u>
- **Gene Name:** urate oxidase
- **Description:**   uricase / urate oxidase / nodulin 35;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2057727
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
